name: get_data_entity_uid
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ofac_service.
Tool description: Searches an entity from OFAC's Sanctions List with fuzzy logic on its name search field to look for potential matches on the Specially Designated Nationals (SDN) List and on its Non-SDN Consolidated Sanctions List.
API description: Fetches an entity record from the OFAC service using a unique identifier (UID).

uid.description: The unique identifier of the entity to retrieve.
